details.callToWorship: God Moves in a Mysterious Way #073
details.song: I Will Sing the Wondrous Story #537
details.songOfAdoration: Stand Up, Stand Up for Jesus #485

list: March 1: Quarterly business meeting following the evening service.
March 8: Fifth-annual chili cook-off and fellowship meal. Please sign up to bring chili, crackers, cheese, desserts, etc. in the foyer.
March 9: Women On Mission will meet at 6:00 PM in the Lewis Fellowship Hall. Barbara Hoskins will present the program, and Ann Deaton & Lisa Thomas will provide the food. All women are welcome.
March 28: Spring workday here at the church building from 10:00-2:00.
